segments.text: Either we'll be millionaires , or we won't ... won't have a dime .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And it's all coming down to the next three weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The only person who seems confident the software will be done on time is Zina .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , she is some kind of Superwoman , isn't she ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Failure just isn't an option for her . I'm glad she's on our team .
segments.speaker: S1
